title: Corduroy
description: Corduroy is a bear who once lived in the toy department of a big store. Day after day he waited with all the other animals and dolls for somebody to come along and take him home.So begins Don Freeman's tale about a bear in search of a home and a girl in search of a friend. Since 1968, this charming story has found its way into the homes and hearts of children all over the world, becoming a best-loved classic.Now, celebrate the anniversary of Corduroy's fortieth year in print with this all-new edition. Packed with never-before-seen material, including original sketches, an early draft of the Corduroy manuscript, and letters between Don Freeman and his publisher from the 1960s, this very special volume is a must-have for long-time fans and new readers alike.
author: Don Freeman
